# PATCH /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/activity | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ PATCH /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/activity ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity)

-  PATCH /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/activity 

Web Service Endpoint# PATCH /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/activity

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity#url)



```
PATCH https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/activity
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity#http-body)

`[GameCenterAchievementActivityLinkageRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementactivitylinkagerequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity#response-codes)

` 204 No Content``No Content`

` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 409 Conflict``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Conflict`

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity#see-also)

### [Creating, modifying, and deleting achievements](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-gameCenterAchievements-_id_-relationships-activity#Creating-modifying-and-deleting-achievements)

[`Create an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenterachievements)Add an achievement to a Game Center detail.[`Modify an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_)Modify properties for a specific achievement.[`Modify the group for an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-groupachievement)Modify the achievement group for a specific achievement.[`Delete an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_)Delete a specific achievement.
